57th West Elevator
The 57th west elevator is out of service. Customers can use 51st/ 53rd St (Hyde Park) or 115th Kensington as alternate boarding stations. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Millennium Station Elevator
The Millennium Station elevator is out of service until further notice. Customers can use South Water or Van Buren as alternate boarding stations. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDW Train #2218 Will Not Operate

Train #2218, scheduled to depart Franklin Park at 7:46 a.m., will not operate. Train #2222, scheduled to depart Big Timber Road at 7:20 a.m., will make additional stops between Franklin Park and Grand/Cicero to accommodate customers.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
RID #300 Stopped
Train #300 scheduled to arrive LaSalle Street station at 7:25 AM, is stopped due to an earlier train striking a vehicle. Estimated time of delay is unknown. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
RID Train #404 Remains Stopped
Inbound train #404, scheduled to arrive Chicago at 6:57 a.m., remains stopped at 111th St., due to striking a vehicle. Updates will be provided as more info becomes available.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UPN Winnetka West Elevator Out of Service
The Winnetka West elevator is out of service. Customers can use Glencoe or Kenilworth as alternate boarding stations. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-NW?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UPNW Train #618 Will Not Operate
Train #618 scheduled to depart Des Plaines at 7:07 a.m., will not operate due to positive train control issues. Train #626 schedule to depart Crystal Lake at 6:45 a.m., will accommodate customers.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Homewood East Side Construction Will Begin March 13

Beginning Monday, March 13, access to the Homewood Station from the east will be closed for station construction until Summer 2024.  Access to the boarding platform will be through the Park Avenue entrance ONLY (west side of tracks).

 

Beginning, Monday, March 6, the Pace bus stop will relocate from Harwood Avenue to Park Avenue.  Please allow additional time and use caution near the work zone.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME -  79th street/Chatham Station Closure Beginning July 10 - Station Rebuild Project.

The 79th street/Chatham station on the Metra Electric line will be closed beginning Monday, July 10 for approximately 9 months. During this time passengers can use 75th and 83rd street stations as alternatives. This is part of the Metra Electric Community initiative to transform multiple stations on the Metra Electric District. Once completed, stations will have enclosed ADA-accessible street-level entrances, lobbies with elevators, new stairs, headhouses, new composite deck platforms, new lighting, and signage.  For more information click here.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert MD-N - Track construction at Grayland Station, Rondout and Everett crossing extended through June 2024

Track construction will be taking place at the Grayland station, Rondout, and the Everett crosssing has been extended through June, 2024. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 15 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone until the work is complete. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert UP-W -  Geneva Platform 2 Rehabilitation

On Monday, October 9, the Geneva outbound platform (Platform 2) will be closed for rehabilitation through the end of 2024. Commuters must use the temporary platform located east of Third Street. All trains will board passengers from the rear cars on this platform. Please allow additional time to access the in-service platform and exercise caution near the work zones.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - Stairway Construction at University Park
Reconstruction of the stairs at the University Park station will begin in early November. Metra anticipates completion of the project by early 2024. Please exercise caution near the work zone.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - Metra Electric 103rd station to close November 20 - Full Reconstruction

As part of the Metra Electric Community Initiative to transform 13 stations on the district, the 103rd Street/Rosemoor station will be closed beginning November 20 for a full reconstruction. The station is expected to be closed 7 to 12 months. Durng this time, customers can use 107th Street and 95th Street/Chicago State University as alternatives. For additional information click here.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - 147th St./Sibley Blvd station closed for reconstruction until late summer 2024

The 147th street/Sibley Blvd station is closed for reconstruction until late summer 2024. During this time, trains will not stop at this station. As alternates, please use the nearby Ivanhoe or Harvey stations. Updates will be provided once the rehabiliation is complete and the station is accessible. Metra apologizes for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.
